TextView.android:text: This IQ Test consists of 10 Questions which are selected randomly from the question bank. Questions are based on Verbal, Mathematical, Spatial,Visualization, Classification, Logic&Pattern recognition ability to determine your IQ. Time limit to complete the test is 10 minutes after which the test will be automatically submitted and your score is generated. Question once attempted cannot be reattempted. After the completion of the test, your IQ score will be displayed along with the category you fall in.ENJOY !!!!!
